channel.title: [317] Inter-Pk | VPS | Webclient | 100% Uptime | Eco | PvM | Pking
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/interpkbanner.png[/img]
Very new server which is hosted via windows VPS with download and webclient connection options. Currently we have a small player base of about 10 active players. Updates happen daily to provide players with enjoyable content and to ensure stability. Update logs, game info, and more can all be viewed on the homepage and forums. We hope to see you soon.
[B]WEBCLIENT LINK:[/B]
[url=http://inter-pk.webs.com/playwebclient.html]http://inter-pk.webs.com/playwebclient.html[/url]
[B][COLOR=orange]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/COLOR][/B]
[url=http://inter-pk.webs.com/interpkdownload.htm]http://inter-pk.webs.com/interpkdownload.htm[/url]
[B][COLOR=blue]FORUMS LINK:[/COLOR][/B]
[url=http://inter-pk.webs.com/]http://inter-pk.webs.com/[/url]
[B]Media:[/B]
The Inter-Pk Guide is very helpful to new players [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/inter-pkguide.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/inter-pkguide.png[/img][/URL]
Receive a combat lamp upon first log in to the Inter-Pk [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/welcomelamp.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/welcomelamp.png[/img][/URL]
Skilling hut [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/skilling.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/skilling.png[/img][/URL]
Maze minigame [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/mazeminigame.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/mazeminigame.png[/img][/URL]
State of the art thieving guards to cut down on bots [IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/thieving.png[/img]
Fighting Tormented Demons [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/tormenteddemons.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/tormenteddemons.png[/img][/URL]
NPC which gives you a skull to quickly PK [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/skulled.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/skulled.png[/img][/URL]
Skillcape emotes [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/skillcapeemote.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/skillcapeemote.png[/img][/URL]
Who doesn't like cats? [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/pets.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/pets.png[/img][/URL]
Rocktail fishing [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/rocktailfishing.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/rocktailfishing.png[/img][/URL]
Player vs. Player [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/pking.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/pking.png[/img][/URL]
Quick main PK set [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/mainpkset.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/mainpkset.png[/img][/URL]
Quick pure PK set [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/purepkset.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/purepkset.png[/img][/URL]
Added EP drop (EP must be 85 or more to receive added drop) [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/pkingdrop.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/pkingdrop.png[/img][/URL]
Mystery boxes which give clue scroll items + more [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/mysteryboxes.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/mysteryboxes.png[/img][/URL]
Completionist auras for those who max out all skills (gives stats + ability to customize colour) [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/compaura.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/compaura.png[/img][/URL]
In-game highscores that update on logout [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/highscores.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/highscores.png[/img][/URL]
Loyalty titles (many more than just this picture) [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/loyaltytitles.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/loyaltytitles.png[/img][/URL]
Kill Jad to earn your firecape! [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/jad.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/jad.png[/img][/URL]
A small but strong boss [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/bork.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/bork.png[/img][/URL]
Eggs are healthy [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/easterring.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/easterring.png[/img][/URL]
Play the Assault minigame to colour your items [URL=http://s1107.photobucket.com/user/D_I_N_G__O/media/assaultminigame.png.html][IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/assaultminigame.png[/img][/URL]
King black dragon [IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_kbd.png[/img]
Bones on altar [IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_bonesOnAlter.png[/img]
Corporeal beast [IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/corporealbeast.png[/img]
[B]Some Special Attacks:[/B]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/dragonclaws.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/zgsspec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/sgsspec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/agsspec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/bgsspec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/whiprun.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/vlsspec.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/statiuswarhammerspec.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ssspec.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/sol.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/morrigansaxe.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/chaoticmaul.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/darkbowspec.png[/img] [/CENTER]
